column4: mAn error occurred while loading user interface element local_background_image_chooserbutton from file /usr/share/gdm/gdmsetup.glade.  Possibly the glade interface description was corrupted.  gdm cannot continue and will exit now.  You should check your installation of gdm or reinstall gdm.iimithebrain:
oh damn
is there anyone in here that can help with my GDM issue its killing me!
ANYONE please

An error occurred while loading user interface element local_background_image_chooserbutton from file /usr/share/gdm/gdmsetup.glade.  Possibly the glade interface description was corrupted.  gdm cannot continue and will exit now.  You should check your installation of gdm or reinstall gdm.
